sentences: See on üks parimaid päevi aastas.
Meie eesmärk on pakkuda parimaid teenuseid.
context: The word 'parimaid' is the partitive plural form of the Estonian adjective 'parem', which means 'better'. In this case, it functions as a superlative form meaning 'the best ones' or 'the finest ones'. The '-id' ending indicates partitive plural case, suggesting an indefinite or partial quantity of the best items or qualities.
